alert.note: Alert for Kanabec (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 10:41AM CDT until May 15 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River At Mora affecting Kanabec County. .While official observed river levels are not available due to bridge construction, upstream flows indicate the Snake River near Mora has reached Minor flood stage. Minor flooding of the Snake River and nearby tributaries and creeks is expected to end by Sunday evening. For the Snake River...including Mora...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River At Mora. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 4.3 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 10/04/2017. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
